headline: Is It Time To Reassess Assurant (AIZ) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Assurant, at around US$238 a share, still aligns with the value you are looking for, this article walks through what the current price might mean for potential upside and risk. The stock has recently shown steady returns, with about 0.6% over the past week, 2.0% over the last month, 0.1% year to date, 15.6% over 1 year, 97.0% over 3 years and 82.8% over 5 years. These figures may influence how you think about the current price tag. Recent coverage of Assurant has...
